verses.verse: O Jehovah <WH3068>, thou art my God <WH430>; I will exalt <WH7311> thee <WH3034>, I will praise thy name <WH8034>; for thou hast done <WH6213> wonderful <WH6382> things <WH6098>, even counsels of old <WH7350>, in faithfulness <WH530> and truth <WH544>.

For thou hast made <WH7760> of a city <WH5892> a heap <WH1530>, of a fortified <WH1219> city <WH7151> a ruin <WH4654>, a palace <WH759> of strangers <WH2114> to be no city <WH5892>; it shall never <WH5769> be built <WH1129>.
Therefore shall a strong <WH5794> people <WH5971> glorify <WH3513> thee <WH7151>; a city of terrible <WH6184> nations <WH1471> shall fear thee <WH3372>.

For thou hast been a stronghold <WH4581> to the poor <WH1800>, a stronghold <WH4581> to the needy <WH34> in his distress <WH6862>, a refuge <WH4268> from the storm <WH2230>, a shade <WH6738> from the heat <WH2721>, when the blast <WH7307> of the terrible ones <WH6184> is as a storm <WH2230> against the wall <WH7023>.

As the heat <WH2721> in a dry place <WH6724> wilt thou bring down <WH3665> the noise <WH7588> of strangers <WH2114>; as the heat <WH2721> by the shade <WH6738> of a cloud <WH5645>, the song <WH2159> of the terrible ones <WH6184> shall be brought low <WH6030>.

And in this mountain <WH2022> will Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> make <WH6213> unto all peoples <WH5971> a feast <WH4960> of fat things <WH8081>, a feast <WH4960> of wines on the lees <WH8105>, of fat things <WH8081> full of marrow <WH4229>, of wines on the lees <WH8105> well refined <WH2212>.

And he will destroy <WH1104> in this mountain <WH2022> the face <WH6440> of the covering <WH3875> that covereth <WH3874> all peoples <WH5971>, and the veil <WH4541> that is spread <WH5259> over all nations <WH1471>.

He hath swallowed up <WH1104> death <WH4194> for ever <WH5331>; and the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069> will wipe away <WH4229> tears <WH1832> from off all faces <WH6440>; and the reproach <WH2781> of his people <WH5971> will he take away <WH5493> from off all the earth <WH776>: for Jehovah <WH3068> hath spoken it <WH1696>.

And it shall be said <WH559> in that day <WH3117>, Lo <WH430>, this is our God; we have waited <WH6960> for him <WH3467>, and he will save us <WH3068>: this is Jehovah; we have waited <WH6960> for him <WH1523>, we will be glad and rejoice <WH8055> in his salvation <WH3444>.

For in this mountain <WH2022> will the hand <WH3027> of Jehovah <WH3068> rest <WH5117>; and Moab <WH4124> shall be trodden down <WH1758> in his place <WH4963>, even as straw is trodden down <WH1758> in the water of the dunghill <WH4087>.

And he shall spread forth <WH6566> his hands <WH3027> in the midst <WH7130> thereof <WH7811>, as he that swimmeth spreadeth forth <WH6566> his hands to swim <WH7811>; but Jehovah will lay low <WH8213> his pride <WH1346> together with the craft <WH698> of his hands <WH3027>.
And the high <WH4869> fortress <WH4013> of thy walls <WH2346> hath he brought down <WH7817>, laid low <WH8213>, and brought <WH5060> to the ground <WH776>, even to the dust <WH6083>.
